enWisdom: The reward of patience takes away the sufferings of tribulation
Nothing obtains reward like patience does

Wisdom: لَا يُنْعَمُ بِنَعِيمِ الْآخِرَةِ إِلَّا مَنْ صَبَرَ عَلَى بَلَاءِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: None will be rewarded with the bounties of the Hereafter except those who are patient in the face of the tribulations of this world

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْمَضَضِ يُؤَدِّي إِلَى إِصَابَةِ الْفُرْصَةِ
enWisdom: Patience in the face of suffering leads to the gaining of opportunity

Wisdom: صَبْرُكَ عَلَى تَجَرُّعِ الْغُصَصِ يُظْفِرُكَ بِالْفُرَصِ
enWisdom: Your patience in bearing agonies gains you opportunities
One who bears his distress [patiently] realizes [his] opportunities
Patience is an elevation
Be tolerant, [and] your status will become lofty
It is seldom that one is patient yet he does not acquire [his objective]

Wisdom: مَنْ تَجَلْبَبَ الصَّبْرَ وَالْقَنَاعَةَ عَزَّ وَنَبُلَ
enWisdom: One who clothes himself with patience and contentment gains power and nobility

Wisdom: الْزَمِ الصَّبْرَ فَإِنَّ الصَّبْرَ حُلْوُ الْعَاقِبَةِ مَيْمُونُ الْمَغَبَّةِ
enWisdom: Adopt patience, for indeed patience has a sweet end and an auspicious result

Wisdom: لَيْسَ شَيْ‏ءٌ أَحْمَدَ عَاقِبَةً وَلَا أَلَذَّ مَغَبَّةً وَلَا أَدْفَعَ لِسُوءِ أَدَبٍ وَلَا أَعْوَنَ عَلَى دَرَكِ مَطْلَبٍ مِنَ الصَّبْرِ
enWisdom: There is nothing that gives a more praiseworthy result, or a more delightful consequence, or is more repelling for bad etiquette, or more helpful in realizing what is sought, than patience

Wisdom: لَا يَصْبِرُ عَلَى مُرِّ الْحَقِّ إِلَّا مَنْ أَيْقَنَ بِحَلَاوَةِ عَاقِبَتِهِ
enWisdom: None bears the bitterness of truth except the one who is certain of its sweet [and pleasing] aftermath
Judiciousness and excellence lie in patience
With patience, judiciousness is strengthened
Deliberateness is success
Patience constrains the enemies

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَنِ الشَّهْوَةِ عِفَّةٌ وَعَنِ الْغَضَبِ نَجْدَةٌ وَعَنِ الْمَعْصِيَةِ وَرَعٌ
enWisdom: Refraining from lust is chastity, from anger is courage and from sin is piety

Wisdom: احْتَمِلْ مَا يَمُرُّ عَلَيْكَ فَإِنَّ الِاحْتِمَالَ سَتْرُ الْعُيُوبِ وَإِنَّ الْعَاقِلَ نِصْفُهُ احْتِمَالٌ وَنِصْفُهُ تَغَافُلٌ
enWisdom: Tolerate that which comes your way, for indeed tolerance is a [means of] concealing faults and verily the wise one is half [the time] tolerant and half [the time] feigning negligence

Wisdom: إِنْ تَصْبِرُوا فَفِي اللَّهِ مِنْ كُلِّ مُصِيبَةٍ خَلَفٌ
enWisdom: If you are patient, then in [the reward of] Allah there is a restoration [and recompense] from every hardship

Wisdom: إِنْ صَبَرْتَ أَدْرَكْتَ بِصَبْرِكَ مَنَازِلَ الْأَبْرَارِ وَإِنْ جَزِعْتَ أَوْرَدَكَ جَزَعُكَ عَذَابَ النَّارِ
enWisdom: If you are patient, you will attain the stations of the virtuous through your patience, and if you become agitated, then your agitation will cause you to enter the fire of hell
Through patience, [one’s legitimate] desires are realized

Wisdom: تَجَلْبَبِ الصَّبْرَ وَالْيَقِينَ فَإِنَّهُمَا نِعْمَ الْعُدَّةُ فِي الرَّخَاءِ وَالشِّدَّةِ
enWisdom: Dress yourself with patience and certainty, for these two are good provisions in [both] comfort and hardship
The sweetness of victory effaces the bitterness of patience
It is seldom that one is patient yet he does not become powerful
How many a lock has been opened with patience!
One who is patient attains his aspiration
One who seeks relief from patience is relieved by it

Wisdom: مَنْ صَبَرَ عَلَى مُرِّ الْأَذَى أَبَانَ عَنْ صِدْقِ التَّقْوَى
enWisdom: One who remains patient throughout the long harassment [of people] has demonstrated true piety

Wisdom: مَنْ صَبَرَ عَلَى طُولِ الْأَذَى أَبَانَ عَنْ صِدْقِ التُّقَى
enWisdom: One who remains patient throughout the long harassment [of people] has demonstrated true piety
One whose patience is prolonged, his breast becomes straitened
He who is patient is not afflicted
One who adopts patience does not fail

Wisdom: مَا دَفَعَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عَنِ الْمُؤْمِنِ شَيْئاً مِنْ بَلَاءِ الدُّنْيَا وَعَذَابِ الْآخِرَةِ إِلَّا بِرِضَاهُ بِقَضَائِهِ وَحُسْنِ صَبْرِهِ عَلَى بَلَائِهِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, does not repel any of the afflictions of this world and chastisements of the Hereafter from the believer except because of his satisfaction with His decree and his good patience in the face of His trials

Wisdom: هَدَى [اللَّهُ‏] مَنِ ادَّرَعَ لِبَاسَ الصَّبْرِ وَالْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: The one who wears the garment of piety and certitude is [truly] guided
There is no stumbling with patience
